gameRecap.title: Game Recap: Wizards 137, Pacers 123
gameRecap.excerpt: The Wizards defeated the Pacers, 137-123. Kyle Kuzma recorded 31 points, five rebounds, and four assists for the Wizards, with Jordan Poole (30 points, eight assists) and Corey Kispert (23 points) combining for 53 points in the victory. Isaiah Jackson tallied a season-high 20 points and 13 rebounds for the Pacers in the defeat. The Wizards improve to 4-20 in the regular season, while the Pacers fall to 13-10.
